attributes.additional_details:
The major news reporters in this country focus on a disproportionate amount of negative news.

I believe this is creating unnecessary fear and making for a miserable society where conversation is drawn to the negative aspects of what is mostly a lovely country.

This petition is for a more balanced array of news to be reported on, highlighting more of what is great about the world we live in.

Please note I do not wish for biassed reporting towards the positive, simply a realistic representation.
